forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Isolated thunderstorms early, overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Isolated thunderstorms this evening, then cloudy with rain likely late. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Isolated thunderstorms in the morning, then skies turning partly cloudy late. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning. Partly cloudy skies late. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
